long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Detect Auto's browser extension helps enhance auto repair shop productivity by automatically tracking vehicle maintenance, displaying repair order profitability, and improving customer concern collection with an AI assistant. The Tekmetric and Shop-Ware integration is seamless with a minimally invasive design.

To use this extension, install it and then click on the extension icon to log in! Every shop receives a 14-day free trial of the customer concern assistant and profitability analysis tools.
